document_data.name: The Flourished Flagon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Flourished Flagon''' was a tavern in [[Berdusk]] catering mostly to adventurers belonging to the shorter races of humanoids.
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the [[Berdusk#Castle Hill|Castle Hill]] area, a block west of [[Twilight Hall]] at the north east corner of said block, just across the street from Athalankeir House.<ref>

Interior.Atmosphere: The Flourished Flagon was a loud establishment where its patrons let off steam, singing, dancing, and throwing their cups at each other. [[Dwarves]], [[gnome]]s, and [[halfling]]s made up the majority of the clientele, while [[elves]] and [[human]]s were made to feel not entirely welcome.

document_data.Services: The Flourished Flagon was a drinking establishment.
document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was owned by multiple gnomes who all answered to the name [[Marklo]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The Marklos were rumored to offer banking services to preferred customers, and even fence stolen goods.
